com.here.android.mpa.common

Class LocationDataSourceHERE

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.common.LocationDataSource
      • com.here.android.mpa.common.LocationDataSourceHERE

  • public abstract class LocationDataSourceHERE
extends LocationDataSource
    Abstract class that defines the interface for providing positions updates from a HERE hybrid location data source. Instance of this class can be created with LocationDataSourceHERE.getInstance(StatusListener) call.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  LocationDataSourceHERE.IndoorPositioningMode
      Defines supported indoor positioning modes.
      static class  LocationDataSourceHERE.IndoorPositioningModeSetResult
      Defines result codes for indoor positioning mode set call.

        public static LocationDataSourceHERE getInstance()

      • getInstance

        public static LocationDataSourceHERE getInstance(com.here.android.positioning.StatusListener statusListener)
        Get access to the LocationDataSourceHERE Singleton. MapsEngine has to be successfully initialized before the call.
        Parameters:
        statusListener - Status listener instance for retrieving HERE positioning related events.
        Returns:
        LocationDataSourceHERE instance

      • setIndoorPositioningMode

        public abstract LocationDataSourceHERE.IndoorPositioningModeSetResult setIndoorPositioningMode(LocationDataSourceHERE.IndoorPositioningMode mode)
        Set indoor positioning mode. Mode defines which radio maps HERE positioning is allowed to use.
        Parameters:
        mode - New indoor positioning mode.
        Returns:
        Result for the mode change.
        See Also:
        LocationDataSourceHERE.IndoorPositioningMode}
